handwriting_sample.name: Handwriting Sample
handwriting_sample.description: Isang sulat-kamay na natagpuan sa crime scene na may mga kahina-hinalang pagkakaiba.

details.location: Natagpuan sa: Patrol Logbook ng Barangay Hall
details.analysis: Ang stroke pattern at letter formation ay HINDI match sa handwriting ni Leo Mendoza
details.significance: Patunay na may nag-tamper sa official police records

logbook.name: Patrol Logbook
logbook.description: Opisyal na police logbook na nagpapakita ng mga pagkakaiba sa timeline ng incident report.

details.discrepancy: Ang handwriting ay HINDI kay Leo - may nag-fake ng entry
details.significance: Patunay ng cover-up sa police records

broken_body_cam.name: Nasirang Body Camera
broken_body_cam.description: Nasirang police body camera na may potensyal na ma-recover na footage at audio.

details.damage: Status: Critically damaged, pero may recoverable data
details.significance: Maaaring may footage ng actual incident

radio_log.name: Radio Communication Log
radio_log.description: Police radio communications na nagpapakita ng mga gaps sa komunikasyon at coordination issues.

details.officer: Radio calls: PO1 Darwin, pero may gaps
details.missing_calls: Walang radio activity sa critical time period

autopsy_report.name: Autopsy Report
autopsy_report.description: Medical report na may mga pagkakaiba na sumasalungat sa opisyal na police narrative.

details.time_of_death: Actual Time of Death: 9:00 PM (vs Police Report: 11:00 PM)
details.wounds: Defensive wounds sa kamay - nag-fight back si Leo
details.dna: Foreign DNA sa fingernails - hindi kay Leo
details.significance: Patunay na hindi suicide - may struggle at ibang tao

leos_notebook.name: Leo's Notebook Photos
leos_notebook.description: Mga photos ng notebook pages na kinuha ni Dr. Leticia Salvador bago kunin ng police evidence team.

details.contents: Mga pangalan, petsa, at code words tungkol sa corruption
details.key_entries: Shady deals, kakaibang patrol logs, mga taong pumupunta sa barangay
details.significance: Leo's 'treasure chest' - evidence ng police corruption
details.threat: Leo: 'Kung mawala ako, ang katotohanan ay nasa mga pahina na yun'
details.source: Photos taken by Dr. Leticia Salvador before police confiscation
